fields.name: Kehinde Makinwa
fields.body: I use @Takwimu. Incredibly easy, even for people like me who have limited dataviz skills.

fields.name: Alaba Aladegbaiye
fields.body: Regular reminder that @Takwimu is a great company, always improving their product, and very helpful customer service.

fields.name: Adediran Adamu
fields.body: Totally in love with the @Takwimu responsive options <3
